preferencesTitle.message: What do you want to skip?

relaxAndEnjoy.message:
You can now relax and enjoy watching movies as usual! We will automagically skip any unwanted scene.
On every movie, we will let you know if it is:

cut.message: Cut: All unwanted scenes will be skipped.

unsafe.message: Unsafe: Beware! We can't skip all unwanted scenes yet.

unknown.message: Unknown: Careful! Movie might have unwanted scenes.

noFilters.message: No filters for this film. Be the first one to add one!

clickToStartFilter.message: Click to start a new filter (Alt+N)

youToldToSkip.message: You told us to skip this

youToldNotToSkip.message: You didn't tell us to skip this

noMovie.message: Open a specific movie/show to start using Ohana. If you've already opened a movie, try refreshing the page.

h_inactive.message: You are not using Ohana to skip content

inactive.message: To automagically skip unwanted scenes, let us know <router-link to='/preferences'>your sensitivity</router-link>

cleanMovie.message: Enjoy! This is a clean movie, there is no need to skip anything!

safeMovie.message: Grab some popcorn and enjoy! We will skip {n} unwanted scene(s)

unsafeMovie.message: This movie has unwanted scenes that we can't skip yet. | This movie has unwanted scenes that we can't skip yet. We will skip {n} scene(s), but there are more.

unknownContent.message: This movie might contain unwanted scenes. | This movie might contain unwanted scenes. We will skip {n} scene(s), but there might be more.

considerCollab.message: Please consider donating or becoming an editor to support the creation of new filters.

openValidProvider.message: To use Ohana please open one of our supported content providers:

moreOnWebsite.message: Visit Ohana Website to find out more about skipping content.

loginRequired.message: Login/register is required before creating or editing filters

lowestLevel.message: You are a level {n} Jedi. Some of your changes might require approval by higher ranking users. Edit movies and earn community recognition to grow into the higher ranks of Ohana.

mediumLevel.message: You are a level {n} Jedi. You can approve changes done by lower ranking users, but some of your own changes might require approval.

highLevel.message: You are a level {n} Jedi. You can do and undo all changes. But remember, with great power comes great responsibility!

helpUsImprove.message: How are we doing? Help us improve

scenePopupDesc.message: Here you can take a quik look to the available scenes, and better understand what we will skip based on your settings from the previous page.
